verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārya śrī-rūpe deoyāila 'avaśeṣa'
tabe sei prasāda kṛṣṇadāsa pāila śeṣa

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārya—Vallabha Bhaṭṭācārya; śrī-rūpe—to Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; deoyāila—offered; avaśeṣa—the remnants; tabe—thereafter; sei—those; prasāda—remnants of food; kṛṣṇadāsa—Kṛṣṇadāsa; pāila—got; śeṣa—the balance.
translation: Vallabha Bhaṭṭācārya first offered the remnants of the Lord's food to Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī and then to Kṛṣṇadāsa.
